title: Rumble Harpoon + Overheat interaction [Gameplay]
body:
Hello,

I was trying out Rumble on this patch, and I found that he has a weird interaction with his harpoons. In the patch notes it says, "If Rumble overheats using Electro Harpoon, he’ll always be able to fire while silence as long as he has 1 charge (same as live)." That's correct, but I found that if you overheat with just one charge you can still use the harpoon even if you didn't overheat using the harpoon. I was at two charges, and I shot one. Then I used the scrap shield and flamespitter to overheat, but was still able to shoot one harpoon a one charge. I was not able to shoot the harpoon when it was at 2 charges however. I am not sure if this is the intended reaction.

As a side note, I tried buying CDR, and it did not affect the harpoons. I think this was intentional, but I just wanted to check.

Thanks!

replies.body: Thank you for the report. I'll direct this to the right people!

I'd like to add something about Super Galaxy Rumble skin:

When second E is used right after you get into danger zone with first cast, it'll show the wrong animation of the projectile (it'll fire a non-empowered one, it doesn't affect gameplay in terms of damage/slow but it's still rather confusing). Also, it seems like Rumble just kinda forgot what his E even does since after this occurs, firing consecutive Es will also play voice lines reserved for casting empowered Q/W. Could you look into that too please?

Super Galaxy Rumble skin has a bunch of quirky things with it. I think there is also a collision detection/pathing issue with it that I don't see with the other skins when trying to walk through/around minions. I often get stuck in place doing a crazy breakdance when trying to walk out until the minions move around me.
From my point of view that's a thing with all of the Rumble skins, looks like that collision radius reduction didn't help much in the end.
